resources.string: Developed by Thomas Bau and Alex Hornick.

This is a painting app where you can draw with lines, rectangles, and freestyle! You can select different colors, line thickness, background color, and even a color filter. You can also erase any mistakes using the eraser, undo, or clear buttons.

Logo Made with Logo Maker by Alex Hornick
 Color Wheel Hexagon from w3schools: https://www.w3schools.com/colors/img_colormap.gif
